text: Gordon Russell Sullivan (September 25, 1937 - January 2, 2024) was a United States Army general. He served as the 32nd Chief of Staff of the U.S. Army, as a member of the Joint Chiefs of Staff. Sullivan also served as Acting Secretary of the Army. Sullivan died on January 2, 2024 at his home in Falmouth, Massachusetts at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * TESTIMONY BEFORE THE U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, COMMITTEE ON ENERGY AND COMMERCE , SUBCOMMITTEE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENT Category:1937 births Category:2024 deaths Category:United States Secretaries of the Army Category:Politicians from Boston Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Military people from Massachusetts
title: Gordon R. Sullivan
